Northwestern’s High-Performance Computing (HPC) cluster is ideal to run compute-intensive and data-intensive applications.

Northwesterns University’s high performance computing (HPC) system is called Quest, you can read more about Quest [here]().

Good to know:

* Connect to Quest using the software [MobaXterm]() or [FastX]() .
* The [Quest Quick Start Guide]() provide useful information to get started and find help to common questions and issues when using Quest.
    * and youtube video [Navigating Quest via Shell]() from Northwestern Research Computing Team (they have many more resources!)
* [SLURM guide]() - On the cluster, the SLURM job scheduling system is used
